CHAT.comment: STATE OF NEVADA, ET AL. Petitioners v. FLOYD HICKS, ET AL.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 11:04 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF C. WAYNE HOWLE ON BEHALF OF PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF S. JAMES ANAYA ON BEHALF OF RESPONDENTS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF BARBARA MCDOWELL ON BEHALF OF THE UNITED STATES AS AMICUS CURIAE, SUPPORTING AFFIRMANCE
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF C. WAYNE HOWLE ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
(Whereupon, at 12:05 a.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
